resources.string: 30 Days
Make a Vision Board Together
Looking toward the future is scientifically proven to make you happier. A collaborative vision board ensures that your goals are aligned and that you both feel excited about where you\'re going.
Cuddle Session
Humans have an innate need for physical touch. Research shows that hugging and non-sexual cuddling between romantic couples lowered blood pressure and cortisol while boosting oxytocin.
Describe Your Needs
Trust and open communication go hand-in-hand. A lack of communication about what you want is a key reason couples fight.
Do a Puzzle Together
Couples should always have a feeling of cooperation. Setting aside time together toward a joint goal (however small) helps foster this.
Make a Scrapbook
It\'s easier nowadays to look back at memories and stuff through our mobile phones or social media. But, why not try your hand at making a couple\'s scrapbook instead?
Cook Dinner Together
Do you or your partner love cooking? Making dinner together can help you appreciate all the culinary work they do!
Make Your Monogram
Design a creative monogram using a combination of your initials and then place this design on something special.
Do a Spaghetti Kiss
If you’ve watched the movie Lady and the Tramp, you’ll surely remember its iconic scene: the spaghetti kiss!
Play Mini Golf
From putting balls into clowns mouths to miniature windmills, a round of mini golf is a fun low stress environment in which to have a perfect day with your partner.
Kiss on top of a Ferris Wheel
Some of the most romantic movies feature a smooch on the tippy-top of a ferris wheel.
Sleep under the Stars
Camping out and sleeping outdoors with your significant other either in the mountains or your own backyard, is a great bonding experience.
Watch the Sunset and Sunrise in One Day
Watching a beautiful sunrise or sunset cuddled up with your partner is the epitome of romance.
Climb to the top of a Mountain
They say that “couples that climb together, stay together.”
Take a Spontaneous Relationship
Got some time to spare with a desire to spice up things with your relationship a little bit?
Take a Hot Air Balloon Ride
Jumping into a hot air balloon will take you on a thrilling and romantic ride in the sky.
Make Out at the Movies
While this may not be every couple’s cup of tea, the thrill and riskiness of making out at the movies will be quite the experience.
Go to the Beach
While this may not be every couple’s cup of tea, the thrill and riskiness of making out at the movies will be quite the experience.
Dine out at a Fancy Restaurant
Sometimes it will be ages since your girlfriend and you went out to have a decent dinner without looking at your clocks.
Cliff Jumping while Holding Hands
Grab your partners hand, plug your nose and take a leap of faith…together.
Learn to Tango
The history of the Argentine tango originated in South America in the 1890s and has been called the sexiest dance in the world.
Kiss Your Partner in the Rain
As a relationship progresses we can forget the importance of just kissing!
Do a Couple\'s Photo Session
Even if one of you is a little bit apprehensive about getting their photo taken at first, a professional photo shoot is a brilliant way to get some wonderful memories of your relationship.
Picks Apple (or Berries) at a Farm
Picking berries (especially during spring to summer) is another great outdoor activity that you can do with your partner.
Hike a New Trail
If the two of you are interested in the outdoors, being active, or exploring something new, or the combination of all three, perhaps it’s time to take your romantic day on a hike?
Jump Out of a Plane (Skydive!)
Since we are on a lifelong journey of making lasting memories with our partner, why not add something that goes above and beyond your comfort zone, like tandem skydiving?
Kiss Under the Mistletoe During The Holidays
The holiday season can also be the time for romance.
Stay in a Cabin in the Woods
Whether you\’re both the adventurous type or simply looking for a cozy and quiet getaway, staying at a cabin surrounded by nature is the perfect place to be.
Go Ice Skating
When the winter months roll around and you simply can\'t spend another day inside, spend a day at your local ice rink.
Do a Food Truck Tour
Support local entrepreneurs while you enjoy a range of tasty treats.
Visit Your Partner\'s Hometown
Heading to your partner\'s hometown is a great way to learn more about their childhood.
